Tensorflow's website.
Do not use apt get nvidia-cuda-toolkit.
Try to install CUDA 9.0 by deb.

Then set environment path.
I think it would work.

body:
Tensorflow's website.
Do not use apt get nvidia-cuda-toolkit.
Try to install CUDA 9.0 by deb.
You can download it from Nvidia (just search CUDA 9.0 on Google) and copy cudnn files into /.../cuda
Then set environment path.
I think it would work.
